      • unpaidJobsForCustomer

        public java.util.ArrayList<Job> unpaidJobsForCustomer(Customer customer)
        Gets a list of unpaid jobs for a Customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer to check.
        Returns:
        list of Job objects that are not paid.
        See Also:
        Customer, Job

      • addCustomer

        public boolean addCustomer(Customer customer)
        Adds the customer to the database. This also sets the Customer's date created to the current date. Returns true if the Customer has successfully been added to the database, or false if a Customer with the same e-mail already exists.
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer to add to the database.
        Returns:
        whether the customer has successfully been added to the database.
        See Also:
        Customer

      • updateCustomer

        public void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
        Updates the Customer's details in the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer to be updated.
        See Also:
        Customer

      • getVehiclesForCustomer

        public java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> getVehiclesForCustomer(Customer customer)
        Gets a list of vehicles that the Customer owns.
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer to get the vehicles for.
        Returns:
        a list of Vehicles that the Customer owns.
        See Also:
        Customer, Vehicle
